revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Western Digital |model=TV |revision=Live Hub (1TB) |upc= |ean= |asin=B004GK0GKO |price= |est_release_date=10/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Thailand |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=NAS, media streamer |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Sigma Designs |cpu1_model=SMP8654AD;SMP8654AD-CBE3; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F2G080UB |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,SATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8110SCL |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=HDMI 1.4, Composite A/V, Component Video, SPDIF |tp_firmware= |addl_chips= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:90:A9 }} '''WD TV Live Hub 1TB Media Center ''' [http://support.wdc.com/KnowledgeBase/answer.aspx?ID=5688 Support page] :Model number: WDBABZ0010BBK-NESN :HD: WD Scorpio Blue 2.5" 1TB (WD10TPVT) *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WD_TV#WD_TV_Live_Hub ''WD TV Live Hub'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/3990/western-digital-wdtv-live-hub-review Review on '''AnandTech'''] ===Serial/JTAG=== ====Pinouts==== Serial is '''JP4''' (115200 8N1): 
FRONT
  _____________

R| RX         1 ©
I| GND        2 ©
G| VCC 3.3V   3 ©
H| .          4 ©
T| TX         5 ©
  _____________
REAR
The default login is "root" and the password is the result of "echo $SERIAL | md5sum" :where $SERIAL is the serial number display just before login in the boot log. ===Additional external links=== * [https://defcon.org/images/defcon-22/dc-22-presentations/Leder/DEFCON-22-Felix-Leder-NinjaTV.pdf Def Con 22 presentation] and [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0P1Lx5DRvE video] by ''Felix Leder''. ==Images== Image:Western Digital TV Live Hub Top.JPG|board top Image:WD Live Hub Serial pins.png|Serial pins [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
